TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationDeployment extends System.Object

summary.span: 支援以程式設計方式更新目前的部署，而且可處理視需要下載檔案的工作。

span.span: Supports updates of the current deployment programmatically, and handles on-demand downloading of files.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定您[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式檢查更新，並將它們安裝在會自動透過`subscription`部署資訊清單的項目。You can configure your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application to check for updates and install them automatically through the `subscription` element of the deployment manifest. 某些應用程式，不過，需要更精細地控制其更新。Some applications, however, need finer control over their updates. 您可能想要以程式設計的方式，安裝必要的更新，並提示使用者安裝選用的更新，依其便利性。You may want to install required updates programmatically, and prompt users to install optional updates at their convenience. 藉由關閉訂用帳戶更新部署資訊清單中，您可能需要您的應用程式更新原則的完整控制權。By turning off subscription updates in the deployment manifest, you can take complete control of your application's update policies. 或者，您可以使用自動的訂用帳戶，搭配，可讓[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]定期更新應用程式，但會使用推出後不久，下載重大更新。Alternatively, you can use automatic subscription in conjunction with , which enables [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] to update the application periodically, but uses to download critical updates shortly after they are released. 您可以測試您的部署使用其中一種有可用的更新是否或方法; 第二個方法會引發成功完成時的事件。You can test whether your deployment has an available update by using either the or the method; the latter method raises the event on successful completion. 傳回的更新，例如其版本號碼，以及它是否為目前使用者的必要的更新的重要資訊。 returns important information about the update, such as its version number and whether it is a required update for current users. 如果有可用的更新，您可以安裝它使用或是; 第二個方法會引發完成安裝更新之後的事件。If an update is available, you can install it by using or ; the latter method raises the event after installation of the update is complete. 大型的更新，您可以收到透過進度通知並事件，並使用中的資訊來通知使用者下載狀態。For large updates, you can receive progress notifications through the and events, and use the information in to notify the user of the download status. 您也可以使用下載大型檔案和組件。You can also use to download large files and assemblies on demand. 這些檔案必須標示為 「 選擇性 」 部署的應用程式資訊清單內，讓它們不會在安裝期間下載。These files must be marked as "optional" within the deployment's application manifest so that they are not downloaded during installation. 您也可以使用應用程式的持續時間期間下載的檔案，在任何時間點或方法。You can download the files at any point during the application's duration by using the or the method. 您可以下載組件，然後才載入到記憶體所提供的事件處理常式上的事件類別。You can download assemblies before they are loaded into memory by supplying an event handler for the event on the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說：下載組件隨選與 ClickOnce 部署應用程式開發介面使用設計工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Downloading Assemblies on Demand with the ClickOnce Deployment API Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5). > [!NOTE] > 如果您更新[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式的應用程式執行時，使用者將不會看到更新直到您呼叫方法，會關閉目前的應用程式執行個體，並立即重新啟動它。If you update a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application while the application is running, the user will not see the updates until you call the method of the , which will close the current running instance of the application and immediately restart it. 沒有公用建構函式;取得內類別的執行個體[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式透過屬性。 has no public constructor; you obtain instances of the class within a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application through the property. 您使用屬性，確認目前的應用程式為[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式。You use the property to verify that the current application is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application. 檢查更新和下載的支援檔案以非同步方式更新使用新[事件架構非同步模式概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md)，而這會公開做為類別事件完成回呼。 supports checking for updates and downloading updated files asynchronously by using the new [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md), which exposes completion callbacks as class events. 啟動和管理的執行緒，並在正確的 UI 執行緒上回呼您的應用程式。 starts and manages the threads for you, and calls your application back on the correct UI thread. 透過此類別中，您可以進行更新而無需鎖定的應用程式，讓使用者可以繼續正常運作，但安裝更新。Through this class, you can update without locking up the application, so that the user can continue working while the update installs. 如果使用者在進行更新時，必須停止所有工作，請考慮改為使用同步方法。If the user must stop all work while an update takes place, consider using the synchronous methods instead. > [!NOTE] > 執行非同步的更新需要您的應用程式匯入這兩和命名空間。Performing asynchronous updates requires that your application import both the and namespaces. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會決定在應用程式載入時，是否可用，則會有新的更新如果必要的更新功能，在程式碼範例會以非同步方式安裝更新。The following code example determines at application load time whether a new update is available; if a required update is available, the code example installs the update asynchronously. 此程式碼應該將表單，其中包含名為`downloadStatus`。This code should be added to a form that contains a named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會在完全信任和部分信任的應用程式中運作。This property will work in both fully trusted and partially trusted applications. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用 URL 參數來擷取，以及如何使用類別來安全地剖析查詢字串。The following code shows how to retrieve the URL parameters by using , and how to use the class to parse the query string safely. 相同的查詢字串變數的多個項目將會傳回一個項目中合併。Multiple occurrences of the same query string variable are consolidated in one entry of the returned . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會比較目前已安裝的部署，請參閱部署資訊清單中指定的版本的新版。The method compares the version of the currently installed deployment with the version specified in the deployment manifest found at . 在伺服器上的版本是否已安裝的版本不同，它會傳回`true`。If the version on the server is different from the installed version, it returns `true`. 這個方法會封鎖直到檢查已完成。This method will block until the check has completed. 若要以非同步方式檢查更新，請使用方法改為。To check for an update asynchronously, use the method instead. > [!NOTE] > 如果探索更新可用，而使用者選擇不安裝它，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]會提示使用者，有可用的更新下次執行應用程式。If discovers that an update is available, and the user chooses not to install it, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will prompt the user that an update is available the next time the application is run. 沒有任何方法，若要停用此提示。There is no way to disable this prompting. (如果應用程式的必要的更新，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]它不用提示直接安裝。)(If the application is a required update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will install it without prompting.) ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查應用程式更新項目。如果有的話，就會安裝以同步方式。The following code example checks for an application update; if one is available, it installs it synchronously. remarks.format: ## Remarks 會立即傳回，並啟動個別的執行緒，下載更新的應用程式。 returns immediately and starts a separate thread for downloading the updated application. 當方法完成或取消時，會引發事件。When the method completes or is canceled, it raises the event. 您可以使用中這個事件處理常式，以判斷是否已取消作業，或如果在更新期間引發例外狀況。You can use in this event handler to determine whether the operation was canceled, or if an exception was raised during update. 您可以取消非同步更新方法呼叫。You can cancel an asynchronous update by calling . > [!NOTE] > 如果探索更新可用，而使用者選擇不安裝它，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]會提示使用者，有可用的更新下次執行應用程式。If discovers that an update is available, and the user chooses not to install it, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will prompt the user that an update is available the next time the application is run. 沒有任何方法，若要停用此提示。There is no way to disable this prompting. (如果應用程式的必要的更新，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]它不用提示直接安裝。)(If the application is a required update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will install it without prompting.) ## Examples 下列範例會以非同步方式檢查更新，並安裝更新，如果有的話。The following example checks for an update asynchronously, and installs the update if one exists. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來取消使用起始更新檢查方法。Use this method to cancel an update check initiated with the method. 這個方法不會取消任何背景更新，可能正在進行中，例如訂用帳戶的一部分所啟動的更新。This method will not cancel any background update that may already be in progress, such as an update started as part of a subscription. 如需有關訂用帳戶的詳細資訊，請參閱[選擇 ClickOnce 更新策略](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8b6e7bb-4ea0-47f3-91cd-48580bdceccc)。For more information about subscriptions, see [Choosing a ClickOnce Update Strategy](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8b6e7bb-4ea0-47f3-91cd-48580bdceccc).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法建立執行個體直接在您的應用程式; 您必須擷取有效的執行個體，透過屬性。You cannot create instances of directly in your application; you must retrieve a valid instance through the property. 靜態屬性無效，只能從使用已部署的應用程式內[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。The static property is valid only from within an application that was deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. 嘗試從非呼叫這個屬性[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式將會擲回例外狀況。Attempts to call this property from non-[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications will throw an exception. 如果您正在開發的應用程式，可能會或可能無法部署使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]，使用屬性來測試是否為目前的處理序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式。If you are developing an application that may or may not be deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use the property to test whether the current program is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取和檢查，以判斷是否已在過去三天內更新應用程式。The following code example retrieves and checks to determine whether the application has been updated in the past three days. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式，請在初始化或更新期間將不會下載標示為 「 選擇性 」 應用程式資訊清單中的檔案。In a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, the files marked "optional" in the application manifest are not downloaded during initialization or update. 您可以使用，下載的所有檔案屬於隨選、 具名群組，好讓它們不會耗用網路資源和磁碟空間之前確定使用者需要它們的方法。You can use the method to download all of the files belonging to a named group on demand, so that they do not consume network resources and disk space until you are sure the user requires them. 比方說，某些使用者可能需要使用包含每日的應用程式中，而其他使用者可能永遠不會叫用的資料分析封裝。For example, certain users may need to use a data analysis package included in your application on a daily basis, while other users may never invoke it. 若要使用您已下載的組件，您將附加事件接聽程式。上的事件。To use an assembly you have downloaded with , you attach an event listener to the event on the . 如需範例，請參閱 =[逐步解說： 依需求以 ClickOnce 部署 API 使用設計工具的 下載組件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5)。For an example, see =[Walkthrough: Downloading Assemblies on Demand with the ClickOnce Deployment API Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5). 所有的檔案會下載到[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式快取且因此隔離應用程式的目前版本。All files are downloaded to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application cache and are therefore isolated to the current version of the application. 假設應用程式下載的檔案群組之後，使用者會安裝新版本的應用程式，但是稍後會還原為舊版的應用程式。Let's say that after an application downloads a file group, the user installs a new version of the application, but later reverts to the previous version of the application. 在此情況下，先前的版本仍將保有原先下載的檔案的複本。In this case, the previous version will still have the copies of the files it originally downloaded. 如需有關如何存取資料檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 存取本機和 ClickOnce 應用程式中的遠端資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information about accessing data files, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d). 適用於部分信任應用程式，也就是在任何[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式執行受限制的權限。 works in partially trusted applications, that is, in any [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application running with restricted permission. 不過，如果您嘗試以動態方式載入組件，您的應用程式將會需要完全信任。However, if you attempt to load assemblies dynamically, your application will require full trust. 目前不支援視需要下載的資料檔案。On-demand downloading of data files is currently not supported. 您的應用程式不會回應使用者輸入，直到方法會傳回。Your application will not be responsive to user input until the method returns. 如果您要下載檔案，而不會中斷使用者的工作流程中，使用方法改為。If you need to download files without interrupting the user's workflow, use the method instead. 您無法單獨以其檔案名稱來下載單一檔案。You cannot download a single file by its file name alone. 若要下載單一檔案，將它指派的群組名稱，在您[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]部署和下載使用這個方法的群組。To download a single file, assign it a group name in your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment and download the group using this method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何載入組件視接聽事件。The following code example demonstrates how to load an assembly on demand by listening for the event. [!code-csharp[ClickOnceOnDemandCmdLine#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceOnDemandCmdLine/CS/Form1.cs#2)]

summary.span: 在檔案下載完成時，發生在主應用程式執行緒上。

span.span: Occurs on the main application thread when a file download is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件是在執行緒上呼叫主應用程式。The event is called on the main application thread. 它是執行緒安全地呼叫您的應用程式直接在此回呼的 Windows Form 控制項。It is thread safe to call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback. 請檢查屬性提供給這個回呼。Check the property of the supplied to this callback. 如果這個屬性是`null`，下載已成功; 如果不是`null`安裝失敗，且您可以找到透過安裝失敗的詳細資訊屬性。If this property is `null`, the download was successful; if it is not `null`, the installation did not succeed, and you can find more information about the installation failure through the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會下載說明檔案，在背景中的群組。The following code example downloads a group of Help files in the background. 這個範例需要您部署包含在 Windows Forms 應用程式控制項，以及這個控制項包含控制項，名為`downloadStatus`...The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`.. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件是在執行緒上呼叫主應用程式。The event is called on the main application thread. 它是執行緒安全地呼叫您的應用程式直接在此回呼的 Windows Form 控制項。It is thread safe to call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback. 使用所提供的資訊將進度資訊傳達給您的使用者。Use the information supplied in to communicate progress information to your users. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會下載說明檔案，在背景中的群組。The following code example downloads a group of Help files in the background. 這個範例需要您部署包含在 Windows Forms 應用程式控制項，以及這個控制項包含控制項，名為`downloadStatus`。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 適用於部分信任的應用程式，而不需要任何安全性要求。 works in a partially trusted application without any security demands. 當您更新應用程式，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]隨資料中的任何檔案複製到新版本的資料目錄先前的版本。When you update an application, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] copies any on-demand data files from the previous version into the new version's data directory. 如果您要下載這些檔案的新版本，您應該移除任何您想要保留舊版本中，並將它移到新版本的資料。If you download a new version of these files, you should remove any data you want to keep from the old version and move it into the new version. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會下載中的所有檔案`HelpFiles`群組至磁碟。The following code example downloads all of the files in the `HelpFiles` group to disk. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來判斷是否需要執行任何單次初始化作業的第一次執行應用程式。Use to determine whether you need to perform any one-time initialization operations the first time your application runs. 不要假設設定`true`指出應用程式的這個執行個體是第一個向使用者顯示其使用者介面。Do not assume that a setting of `true` indicates that this instance of an application is the first one to show its user interface to the user. 因為系統排程處理序的方式，可能有一個應用程式的執行個體其屬性設定為`true`，但另一個執行個體可能會呈現在螢幕上的第一個。Due to the way the system schedules processes, one instance of the application may have its property set to `true`, but another instance may be the first to render on the screen. 每當使用者將從一個版本升級到下一步 時，會重設這個屬性的值。The value of this property is reset whenever the user upgrades from one version to the next. 如果您想要執行的作業，只有第一次的任何版本的應用程式執行，您必須執行額外的測試，例如檢查您建立第一次，檔案是否存在，或儲存旗標，使用**應用程式設定**。If you want to perform an operation only the very first time any version of the application is run, you will need to perform an additional test, such as checking for the existence of a file you created the first time, or storing a flag using **Application Settings**. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用決定是否要檢查的檔案群組的更新`HelpFiles`。The following code example uses to decide whether to check for an update to the file group `HelpFiles`. 如果一或多個檔案已更新，則會呼叫來取得新的版本。If one or more of the files have been updated, it calls to obtain the new versions. [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要執行這兩個內部和外部的應用程式[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]（例如，如果您需要偵錯在本機電腦上的應用程式，再將它部署） 的部署、 測試才能存取屬性。If you want your application to run both inside and outside of a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment (for example, if you need to debug your application on the local computer before deploying it), test before accessing the property. 會傳回`true`不論是安裝或線上，裝載應用程式，也不論它是否已安裝從網站、 檔案共用或 CD-ROM。 will return `true` regardless of whether the application is installed or hosted online, and regardless of whether it was installed from a Web site, file share, or CD-ROM. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取利用第一次以確保參考不是`null`。The following code example retrieves by using first to ensure that the reference is not `null`. remarks.format: ## Remarks A[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]可以設定訂用帳戶更新的應用程式。A [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application can be configured for subscription updates. 在此案例中，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]輪詢部署資訊清單中定義的間隔，自動的應用程式的部署位置，並判斷是否有可用更新。In this scenario, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] polls an application's deployment location automatically at intervals defined in the deployment manifest, and determines whether there is an update available. 傳回上次更新檢查，不論它已起始訂用帳戶或使用明確的核取的時間， ， ， ，或方法。 returns the time of the last update check regardless of whether it was initiated by a subscription or by an explicit check using the , , , , or method. 如果沒有更新檢查已執行，因為已安裝應用程式，傳回的安裝時間。If no update check has been performed since the application was installed, returns the installation time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查是否[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]可用的更新，在過去三天內，已檢查過的應用程式。The following code example checks whether a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has been checked for available updates in the past three days. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

span.span: if an application has been updated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您發行新版本的應用程式所指定的位置時，更新被視為應用程式，且應用程式的部署資訊清單中的版本號碼大於應用程式的版本號碼目前使用者的電腦上安裝。An application is considered updated when you publish a new version of the application to the location specified by , and the version number in the application's deployment manifest is greater than the version number of the application currently installed on the user's computer. 呼叫會封鎖，直到更新下載至用戶端電腦和安裝到[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]快取，而且在此期間，應用程式不會對使用者的回應。The call will block until the update has been downloaded to the client computer and installed into the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] cache; during this time, the application will not be responsive to the user. 如果您想要維護應用程式回應速度，或下載期間，使用顯示進度報告方法改為。If you want to maintain application responsiveness or display a progress report during download, use the method instead. 下載所有未標示為 「 選擇性 」 應用程式資訊清單中的檔案。 downloads all of the files that are not marked as "optional" in the application manifest. 您可以使用，以下載選用的檔案，視或方法。You can download optional files on demand by using the or the method. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 可能已更新了應用程式會自動呼叫時方法; 如果發生這種情況，呼叫此方法會擲回。 may already be updating the application automatically when you call the method; if that happens, calls to this method will throw an . 如果您已在您部署中，更新一個或多個檔案，但不是重新整理您的應用程式資訊清單，您會收到。If you have updated one or more files in your deployment, but you have not refreshed your application manifest, you will receive an . 大部分的情況下，重新部署您[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]解決這個問題，應用程式。Most of the time, redeploying your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application solves this problem. 如果部署資訊清單或應用程式資訊清單的公開金鑰簽章無效或遺失，也會收到這個例外狀況。You will also receive this exception if a public-key signature on a deployment manifest or application manifest is invalid or missing. 更新可能會要求比舊版應用程式的高層級的本機電腦上的信任。An update may request a higher level of trust on the local computer than the previous version of the application. 如果應用程式使用受信任的應用程式部署，common language runtime (CLR) 信任管理員會檢查部署資訊清單，以判斷其中是否包含有效的信任授權。If the application uses Trusted Application Deployment, the common language runtime (CLR) trust manager examines the deployment manifest to determine whether it contains a valid trust license. 如果部署資訊清單不包含有效的信任授權，請[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]會停止安裝，而且會擲回。If the deployment manifest does not contain a valid trust license, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] stops the installation and throws a . 方法會永遠不會顯示提示，詢問他們是否要授與應用程式執行的權限的使用者。The method will never display a prompt asking the user whether they want to grant the application permission to run. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查應用程式更新項目。如果有可用的更新，就會安裝以同步方式。The following code example checks for an application update; if an update is available, it installs it synchronously. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 啟動此應用程式最新版本的非同步下載和安裝。

span.span: Starts an asynchronous download and installation of the latest version of this application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您發行新版本的應用程式所指定的位置時，更新被視為應用程式，且應用程式的部署資訊清單中的版本號碼大於應用程式的版本號碼目前使用者的電腦上安裝。An application is considered updated when you publish a new version of the application to the location specified by , and the version number in the application's deployment manifest is greater than the version number of the application currently installed on the user's computer. 下載更新，同時[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]將會引發下載狀態的通知的主應用程式執行緒上的事件處理常式。While downloading the update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will raise the event handler on the main application thread to inform you of the status of the download. 完成非同步的更新，或發生例外狀況，當[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]將會引發主應用程式執行緒上的事件。When the asynchronous update finishes or encounters an exception, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will raise the event on the main application thread. 檢查提供給這個事件，以判斷更新是否成功。Examine the supplied to this event to determine whether the update succeeded. 如果例外狀況，則會擲回[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]呼叫，並設定屬性擲回的例外狀況。If throws an exception, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] calls and sets the property of to the exception that was thrown. 將下載在部署中未標記為 「 選擇性 」 應用程式資訊清單中的所有檔案。 will download all files in a deployment not marked as "optional" in the application manifest. 您可以使用，以下載選用的檔案，視或方法。You can download optional files on demand by using the or the method. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 可能已更新了應用程式會自動呼叫時方法; 如果發生這種情況，呼叫此方法會擲回。 may already be updating the application automatically when you call the method; if that happens, calls to this method will throw an . 如果您已在您部署中，更新一個或多個檔案，但不是重新整理您的應用程式資訊清單，您會收到。If you have updated one or more files in your deployment, but you have not refreshed your application manifest, you will receive an . 大部分的情況下，重建您的應用程式資訊清單解決此問題。Most of the time, rebuilding your application manifest solves this problem. 如果部署資訊清單或應用程式資訊清單的公開金鑰簽章無效或遺失，也會收到這個例外狀況。You will also receive this exception if a public-key signature on a deployment manifest or application manifest is invalid or missing. 更新可能會要求比舊版應用程式的高層級的本機電腦上的信任。An update may request a higher level of trust on the local computer than the previous version of the application. 如果應用程式使用受信任的應用程式部署，common language runtime (CLR) 信任管理員會檢查部署資訊清單，以判斷其中是否包含有效的信任授權。If the application uses Trusted Application Deployment, the common language runtime (CLR) trust manager examines the deployment manifest to determine whether it contains a valid trust license. 如果部署資訊清單不包含有效的信任授權，請[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]會停止安裝，而且會擲回。If the deployment manifest does not contain a valid trust license, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] stops the installation and throws a . 永遠不顯示提示，詢問使用者是否要授與應用程式執行的權限。 will never display a prompt asking the user if they want to grant the application permission to run. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓您判斷是否有新的更新可在應用程式載入時間;如果必要的更新功能，它會以非同步方式安裝更新。The following code example determines whether a new update is available at application load time; if a required update is available, it installs the update asynchronously. 這個範例需要您部署包含在 Windows Forms 應用程式控制項，以及這個控制項包含控制項，名為`downloadStatus`。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 已完成升級應用程式時發生，該升級是藉由呼叫 而產生。

span.span: Occurs when [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] has finished upgrading the application as the result of a call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件是在執行緒上呼叫主應用程式。The event is called on the main application thread. 您可能會呼叫您的應用程式直接在此回呼的 Windows Form 控制項而不觸發例外狀況。You may call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback without triggering an exception. 請檢查屬性提供給這個回呼。Check the property of the supplied to this callback. 如果這個屬性是`null`，安裝是否成功; 如果不是`null`安裝失敗，且您可以找到透過此安裝失敗的詳細資訊屬性。If this property is `null`, the installation was successful; if it is not `null`, the installation did not succeed, and you can find more information about this installation failure through the property. 一旦下載更新後，您必須呼叫方法使用較新版本的應用程式。Once the update has been downloaded, you will need to call the method on the to use the newer version of the application. 如果在更新安裝已取消由呼叫，則屬性類別將會是`true`。If the installation of the update was canceled by a call to , the property of the class will be `true`. 若要使用這個事件處理常式，您的應用程式必須匯入這兩和命名空間。To use this event handler, your application must import both the and namespaces. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會決定在應用程式載入時，是否可用，則會有新的更新如果必要的更新功能，它會以非同步方式安裝更新。The following code example determines at application load time whether a new update is available; if a required update is available, it installs the update asynchronously. 這個範例需要您部署包含在 Windows Forms 應用程式控制項，以及這個控制項包含控制項，名為`downloadStatus`。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於如果已安裝新的更新，但是尚未呼叫上。 differs from if a new update has been installed but you have not yet called on the . 如果應用程式的部署資訊清單設定為執行自動更新，您可以比較這兩個值，以判斷是否應該重新啟動應用程式。If the application's deployment manifest is configured to perform automatic updates, you can compare these two values to determine whether you should restart the application. 如果應用程式尚未更新，會傳回相同的值。If the application has not been updated, returns the same value as . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義方法，判斷是否[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]已更新應用程式。The following code example defines a method that determines whether [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] has updated the application. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能與用來下載應用程式一開始，如果應用程式的部署已設定為使用更新的重新導向的網站不同。 may be different from the Web site used to download the application initially if the application's deployment is configured to use update redirection. 只有在應用程式的部署資訊清單中，可以變更此值。This value can be changed only in the application's deployment manifest.
